data.name: Crane’s Echoing Call
data.passiveDescription: After the equipping character hits an opponent with a Plunging Attack, all nearby party members’ Plunging Attacks will deal {{28//41//54//67//80%}} increased DMG for 20s. When nearby party members hit opponents with Plunging Attacks, they will restore {{2.5//2.75//3//3.25//3.5}} Energy to the equipping character. Energy can be restored this way every 0.7s. This energy regain effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is not on the field.
